mapper.select: select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(reviewId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(reviewId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(reviewId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(reviewId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(reviewId), 12))) AS reviewId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(placeId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(placeId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(placeId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(placeId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(placeId), 12))) AS placeId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, content, isDeleted, uploadedDate, modifiedDate, deletedDate from review order by uploadedDate

select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(reviewId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(reviewId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(reviewId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(reviewId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(reviewId), 12))) AS reviewId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(placeId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(placeId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(placeId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(placeId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(placeId), 12))) AS placeId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, content, isDeleted, uploadedDate, modifiedDate, deletedDate from review where reviewId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{reviewid} , '-', '')) order by uploadedDate
